headline: MetLife Appoints Two Experienced Leaders to Board of Directors
summary: NEW YORK, February 24, 2026--MetLife, Inc. (NYSE: MET) today announced that Dan Glaser and Michelle Seitz were elected to its Board of Directors (the "Board"), effective immediately. Both leaders bring significant leadership and business experience to their roles.
